702068f-a.text:
West Farms Road, at the south-east corner of East 167th Street, showing the Foxhurst Mansion, also known as the Tiffany House. Ht was built by Mr. William W. Fox in 1848 on his extensive estate. Apartment buildings were later erected
on the site.
View 1: Gift of Randall Comfort
1898
View 2: E. P. Chrystie
June 1, .2
702068f-a.folder: West Farms Road & East 167th Street., Bronx, NY
702068f-a.original_title: Bronx: West Farms Road - East 167th Street.
